channel.title: Need help making admins as in myself
channel.description: ok everytime i log onto my server i dont know how to make myself admin :confused: :confused: :confused:???? i ckecked every file and no way how to make me and other ppl admins plz help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need help making admins as in myself
item.dc:creator: @glennnn8 glennnn8
item.description:
@glennnn8 wrote:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = --------------------
character-password = --------------------

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0

character-rights = 0 <---- change this to 1 for mod, 2 for admin, 3 for owner.

item.title: Need help making admins as in myself
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Go into you’re source file. Be it Testscape, Pimpscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the person you wan’t to make an administrator/moderator and change the player rights to one of the following :

1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner

Read full topic

go to charcter files and look at there charcters right and change the “0” to ehiter 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner
